name: BrickSpite
description:
BrickSpite is a brick-breaker game by Rebmiami with 15 levels, 60 hidden codes, 7 difficulty options, and a multitude of brick types.

There are lots of secrets hidden within the game. Can you find them all?

CONTROLS

Use the mouse to control the paddle. Depending on where the ball hits the paddle, it will bounce in different directions.

Hit bricks with the ball to destroy them. Once all bricks in a level are destroyed, you will win and may continue to the next level.

In later levels, you will find special brick types that take multiple hits to destroy, become temporarily indestructible, or temporarily phase out of existence.

Use the numbered keys from 1 to 4 to change the window size. To go fullscreen, press 5!

Use the left and right arrow keys on the title screen to change the game's difficulty. If you're new, try Slow or Snail. For a more challenging experience, try Speedy and work your way up to Soulspeed! (Although be warned - the game gets absurdly difficult quite fast)

At the moment, the game is only available for 64 bit Windows.
